Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to enacting the "N.Y. state digital equity plan act"
Summary: Relates to enacting the "N.Y. state digital equity plan act"; requires the division of broadband access to develop a state digital equity plan to increase broadband access to underserved populations by January 1, 2027.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to enacting the "N.Y. state digital equity plan act"
